snippet: In Congress, Rick Santorum often defied his current principles when it came to defending the interests of a Pennsylvania powerhouse: the steel industry.
abstract: Rick Santorum, who has presented himself as a defender of the free market and opponent of bailouts for Wall Street and the auto industry, often defied those principles while defending the interests of Pennsylvania's steel industry during his tenure as a senator there.
lead_paragraph: In Congress, Rick Santorum often defied his current principles when it came to defending the interests of a Pennsylvania powerhouse: the steel industry.

headline.seo: Santorum, Free-Market Defender, Used to Aid Steel Industry
headline.main: Santorum, Defender of Free Market, Pushed in Congress to Protect Big Steel
headline.print_headline: Santorum, Defender of Free Market, Pushed in Congress to Protect Big Steel
